Uses of Class
javax.net.SocketFactory

Packages that use SocketFactory
android.net Classes that help with network access, beyond the normal java.net.* APIs. 
javax.net This package provides factory classes to create sockets and server-sockets. 
javax.net.ssl This package provides all the classes and interfaces needed to implemenet and program the Secure Socket abstraction based on the SSL protocol SSSLv3.0 or TLSv1.2. 
 

Uses of SocketFactory in android.net
 

Subclasses of SocketFactory in android.net
 class SSLCertificateSocketFactory
           
 

Methods in android.net that return SocketFactory
static SocketFactory SSLCertificateSocketFactory.getDefault(int socketReadTimeoutForSslHandshake)
          Returns a default instantiation of a new socket factory which only allows SSL connections with valid certificates.
 

Uses of SocketFactory in javax.net

Fields in javax.net declared as SocketFactory

Methods in javax.net that return SocketFactory
static SocketFactory SocketFactory.getDefault()
          Gets the default socket factory of the system which can be used to create new sockets without creating a subclass of this factory.
